author: cnbc.com
title: Bank of Commerce: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) _ Bank of Commerce Holdings (BOCH) on Friday reported first-quarter earnings of $3.2 million.
The bank, based in Sacramento, California, said it had earnings of 20 cents per share.
The bank holding company posted revenue of $13.5 million in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $12.3 million.
Bank of Commerce shares have fallen nearly 1 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has risen almost 4 percent in the last 12 months.
